# JS required for the site

body: //div[contains(@class, 'm-post__main') or contains(@class, 'm-longread__body')]
strip_id_or_class: m-longread__blocks-footer
strip_id_or_class: m-longread__team
strip_id_or_class: m-post__blocks-footer
strip_id_or_class: m-post__team
strip_id_or_class: ph-info__group

prune: no

test_url: https://postnauka.ru/faq/6604
test_url: https://postnauka.ru/longreads/155958
